name: AMPATH POC Pre Exposure Prophylaxis Follow up Form v1.1

questions.label: What other insurance do you have?
questions.questionInfo: Indicate if the patient has another medical cover.

questions.label: What treatment was given to the client?
Within the past 3 months, have you been hit, slapped, kicked or physically hurt by someone in any way?
Are you in a relationship with a person who physically hit you?
Are you in a relationship with a person who threatens, frightens or insults you or treats you badly?
Are you in relationship with a person who forces you to participate in sexual activities that make you feel uncomfortable?
Have you ever experienced any of the above with someone you do not have a relationship with?
Do you have a plan to have children?
